general_info.summary: This document lists various sections and initiatives related to Sharda University's academic and administrative functions for the 2025-26 program. It covers schools like Dental Sciences, Medical Sciences & Research, and Nursing Science & Research, along with academic reports, feedback mechanisms, university information, leadership and history details, legal and compliance information, student support services such as counselling, skill enhancement programs, and entrepreneurship initiatives. Additionally, it includes details about FM radio, accommodation, visa guidelines, and mentoring portals.
